mapper.select: select a.technology_name ,a.technology_id ,b.technology_id as careertechnology_id from bm002_technology a left join bt004_careertechnology b on b.employee_id = #{employee_id} and b.certification_no = cast(#{certification_no} as integer) and a.technology_id = b.technology_id where a.technology_kbn = #{technology_kbn} order by a.disp_order ,a.technology_name
